SELECT collegeName FROM semester1 AS s1 LEFT OUTER JOIN semester2 AS s2 ON s2.jobNumber = s1.jobNumber INNER JOIN college AS c ON s1.collegeId = c.id WHERE s2.jobNumber is null UNION SELECT collegeName FROM semester2 AS s1 LEFT OUTER JOIN semester1 AS s2 ON s2.jobNumber = s1.jobNumber INNER JOIN college AS c ON s1.collegeId = c.id WHERE s2.jobNumber IS NULL ;
